about_the_game:
The hero is not just a character in the game; he's your companion on this journey, breaking the fourth wall and bringing a new dimension to your gaming experience.

Its comedic personality allows for funny interactions, especially when failing or succeeding in unexpected ways. It has unique lines for different situations, such as losing a life or gaining a new ability, but these dialogues may vary depending on the player's actions.

These lines will make you laugh out loud and moments that will warm your heart, this game promises to be a memorable adventure from start to finish. Put your skills to the test. Join the Fire Boy on his epic mission and "Step into the Heat of Adventure. Destiny Calls!"

Summary of the ''brief summary'' of the story...

On an ordinary day, Aldo finds a magic sphere, triggering an interplanetary journey. He teams up with Guto, an alien who seeks him out for help to save dinosaur eggs that were stolen by the Monstrengos and also to recover the Silver Fire Armor (it enhances his Fire Power), thus becoming the legendary Fire Warrior. With the clock ticking against him, he faces a race against time. As the seconds pass, the eggs are on the verge of hatching, and the Monstrengos are lurking, ready to turn the eggs into snacks or enslave the future dinosaur hatchlings. Aldo embarks on a heroic mission, determined to rescue the eggs and prevent a terrible fate at the hands of the enemies.

Now I want to share with you a little more about the biggest dream of my life: to create a game that goes beyond entertainment, a game that is a unique, exciting, and memorable experience. This dream came to life in "Fire Boy."

Since childhood, games have always been more than just fun for me. They were gateways to incredible worlds, captivating stories, and unforgettable characters. I hope I can provide that same magic for others.

The "Fire Boy" is not just a game. It is the materialization of years of passion, creativity, and hard work. It is the story of a companion and friend hero, who faces great challenges in a world full of dangers and mysteries, who needs your help. It is an adventure that will take you to places you never imagined, awakening emotions ranging from adrenaline to tenderness.

It is not just a project or a professional goal, it is the purpose of my life. Every element of the game, from the plot to the gameplay and graphics, is infused with my essence, my experiences, and my unwavering dedication. This game is an extension of myself, a legacy I want to leave to the world of video games. This project encapsulates my creative soul, and that is why every detail is treated with the utmost care and love. The "Fire Boy" is born from genuine passion and the desire to create something memorable.

Developing a video game is embarking on a journey full of challenges, learning, and above all, passion. Not to mention the boundless dedication! I dedicated myself to creating something truly special, I hope "Fire Boy" manages to touch the hearts of everyone who plays it.

Game made with much love in my humble home.

Everything you see here today was once a dream!

I thank you from the bottom of my heart,

Aldo (Caraca Games)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i3+ ou AMD Athlon 64 3000+ 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 9.1+ or OpenGL 3.2+

short_description: A classic-style 2D platformer adventure, featuring 4 worlds with distinct and challenging characteristics. With its sharp humor and fourth-wall-breaking comments, it will not only be your companion on this perilous journey but also your harshest critic and, surely, your great friend.
supported_languages:
English, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
